title: Can't select champion
body:
So at what seems to be random times, the countdown will simply go to 0 for the pick before me then just sit there until my pick time runs out and then it dodges me. It won't let me select a champion....I'd really appreciate knowing why it does this and how to permanently stop it because these dodge timers are mental. And it really ruins the mojo for the group...

P.S. yes i've repaired my client before.

replies.body: It seems like your client might be losing its connection with the game server you were placed in. Since your client has to pull the list of available champions from the servers to display who you can pick or ban there's a good chance that you need to update some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Check out that guide and make sure to test any changes in a custom/practice match and let me know how it helps.

Hey thanks. But is there no real way to tell which of these options would be the best to start. I mean i already use a wired connection so that'd be the simplest one if needed. I just don't want to have to go option by option if at all possible
